title: Bug 269522[handles] Cross reference view and markers mix up joinpoints assigned to advice
description: Bug 269522[handles] Cross reference view and markers mix up joinpoints assigned to advice
OB: When I select line 22, I see 5 joinpoints, but there should only be 3. When I select line 68, I see zero joinpoints, but there should be 2. Then, when I right click the marker at line 68 and choose 'advises', I see all 5 joinpoints.
EB: The cross reference view and markers should accurately display the joinpoints assigned to advice.
SR: Investigate and fix the issue causing the cross reference view and markers inappropriately displaying joinpoints assigned to advice.
